Applying a design will remove all customisations and associated files from the current design.

Classes specified in this list will be available in DIV properties drop-down list for class. If the list is empty only text field will be used.
Classes specified in this list will be available in WYSIWYG drop-down list for styles. If the list is empty, css file wil be parsed and all class definitions available.
